summary: Replaces the boring old Bethesda intro, and adds excitement even before you have started the game!!!
descriptionHtml:
Welcome!


***If you want the 1080p version download the UPDATED version of this file!!!***
  *This NEW upload now comes without the annoying \"in stores 11.11.11\"!!!*

This basic mod replaces the original intro, and adds excitement and suspense before the game has even begun!!!
Don\'t forget to view the video BEFORE you download, that way you get exactly what you want (:

Please download, endorse, and share (:
author: MorninJerky
